detectors.description:
AKAP.claim(uint256,bytes) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AKAP.sol#1314-1363) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- nodeExists && nodes[nodeId].expiry <= now && isParentOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AKAP.sol#1350)
